channel.title: Version 3.3 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 3.3.0 (2022-03-28) New New Introduct'n o' new CSS variables t' set th' font. Th' theme distinguishes between --MAIN-font fer all rrrambl'n text an' --CODE-font fer inline or block code. There be additional overrides fer all head'ns. See th' theme variant generator o' th' exampleSite fer all avail'ble variables.
